edge: Ajay Devgn plays the dual role of Karan and Doc in this movie.
Ajay Devgn portrays the character of Angad in the film.
The role of Lucky is essayed by Riteish Deshmukh.
Zayed Khan acts as Dhananjay Jhumbevalkar in this movie.
Esha Deol appears on the screen as Pooja.
The character of Shanaya is played by Shamita Shetty.
The roles of Aditi and Jammwal are portrayed by Dia Mirza in this movie.
In the movie, Ayesha Takia portrays both Rhea and Preeti.
Bruna Abdullah appears as a dancer in the song 'Rahem Kare'.
